content: उद्गमः {@--1@} Going up, rising (of stars); ascent; आज्यधूमोद्गमेन <ls>Ś. 1. 15.</ls> {@--2@} Standing erect (of hair); रोमोद्गमः प्रादुरभूदुमायाः <ls>Ku. 7. 77</ls>; व्यक्तरोमोद्गमत्वात् <ls>M. 4. 1</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 36.</ls> {@--3@} Going out, departure, expiry; as in प्राण°. {@--4@} Birth, production, creation; पारिजातस्योद्गमः <ls>Māl. 2</ls>; appearance; फलेन सहकारस्य पुष्पोद्गम इव प्रजाः <ls>R. 4. 9</ls>; <ls>V. 4. 38</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 70</ls>; कतिपयकुसुगोद्गमः कदंबः <ls>U. 3. 20</ls>; so मांस°, पक्ष°, ग्रंथि° &c.; <ls>Amaru. 81</ls>; origin, parentage; <ls>Māl. 2.</ls> {@--5@} Action, vision (of eyes); <ls>Māl. 1. 35.</ls> {@--6@} Projection, elevation; पयोधरोद्गमां <ls>Māl. 7.</ls> {@--7@} A shoot (of a plant); हरिततृणोद्गमशंकया मृगीभिः <ls>Ki. 5. 38.</ls> {@--8@} Vomiting, casting up.
